levels.details: Memento Application Server communication to the local Cassandra has been restored.
levels.description: Memento: Application Server Cassandra communication error cleared
levels.cause: Memento Application Server communication to the local Cassandra has been restored. The previously issued alarm has been cleared.
levels.effect: Normal Memento Application Server operation has been restored.

levels.details: While this condition persists, new call list records will not be written and will be lost. The Application Server will periodically attempt to reconnect.
levels.description: Memento: Application Server Cassandra communication error
levels.cause: Memento Application Server is unable to contact the local Cassandra.
levels.effect: While this condition persists, new call list records will not be written and will be lost.
levels.action: Monitor for the alarm to clear and confirm the system is operating normally. Determine if the local Cassandra process has failed. If it has then make sure it returns to service. If the alarm doesn't clear then contact your support representative.
